†Coelolepiden Pander 1856: 64 (family) †
Coelolepis Pander 1856
[latinized to † Coelolepidae by Woodward 1891a: 157 and by Berg 1940: 363 ; considered valid with this authorship by Woodward 1891a: 157 , by Traquair 1900: 828 , by Obruchev 1964a: 42 , by Karatajūtė-Talimaa 1968: 34 and by Halstead 1993: 576 ; family name sometimes seen as † Coelolepididae ] †
Thelodontidae Jordan 1905: 573
(family) †
Thelodus Agassiz 1838
[
Jordan 1923: 85
and
Burrow et al. 2013: 1046
claim † Thelodontidae as the correct family name; family name sometimes seen as †Thelodontididae]
